title: How to Like a Picture on Yelp

steps.headline: Search for a business where you'd like to like a picture (which will tell the person how cool the picture is).
Click the business listing for the business you'd like to like the picture appears.
steps.description: In the search listings, if there are any pictures, the icon to the left of the business' name will not display the default icon that is pink and purple.

steps.headline: Locate the pictures area of the business page.
steps.description: It should be just slightly to the right and underneath the business' name.

steps.headline: Locate the "Next" button on the page.
steps.description: The Next button will move you through the pictures one by one. The Next button is located just above the big displayable picture in about the center of the displayed part of the page.

steps.headline: Click the Next button to move through the list of pictures.
Click either the "Very helpful" or "Helpful" or "Not Helpful" radio-boxes to the left of the words on the right hand side of the picture that is displaying.
Scroll downwards through the page, to quickly glance at whatever other pictures more quickly appear.
Download, install and open the Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't already done so).
Login to the Yelp for iPhone app, with your Yelp credentials, if you haven't done so already.
Search for the business that contains pictures you'd like to vote on, via the Search bar at the top of the app's Home page screen.
steps.description: Tap the business to select it.

steps.headline: Scroll down a little until you find the section labelled "Photos".
steps.description: This section is directly under the section for the business' website, phone number, and map with directions.

steps.headline: Tap one of the photos.
steps.description: It will display the first three photos that have been uploaded for the business.

steps.headline: Tap the "Like it!"
steps.description: button if you feel this photo is true-to-it's word or has something amusing. It'll turn a bluish-hue and it will say "Liked" underneath the thumb to indicate that you've liked this photo.

The Next button is located just above the big displayable picture in about the center of the displayed part of the page. Click the Next button to move through the list of pictures. Click either the "Very helpful" or "Helpful" or "Not Helpful" radio-boxes to the left of the words on the right hand side of the picture that is displaying. Scroll downwards through the page, to quickly glance at whatever other pictures more quickly appear. Via the iPhone App Download, install and open the Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't already done so). Login to the Yelp for iPhone app, with your Yelp credentials, if you haven't done so already. Search for the business that contains pictures you'd like to vote on, via the Search bar at the top of the app's Home page screen. Tap the business to select it. Scroll down a little until you find the section labelled "Photos". This section is directly under the section for the business' website, phone number, and map with directions. Tap one of the photos. It will display the first three photos that have been uploaded for the business. Tap the "Like it!" button if you feel this photo is true-to-it's word or has something amusing. It'll turn a bluish-hue and it will say "Liked" underneath the thumb to indicate that you've liked this photo.

Via the iPhone App Download, install and open the Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't already done so).

Search for the business that contains pictures you'd like to vote on, via the Search bar at the top of the app's Home page screen.
Tap the business to select it.

Tap one of the photos.
It will display the first three photos that have been uploaded for the business.
Tap the "Like it!"
button if you feel this photo is true-to-it's word or has something amusing.
It'll turn a bluish-hue and it will say "Liked" underneath the thumb to indicate that you've liked this photo.
